SNA_header_description: Tools to capture, upload and analyze data from social media. See pop up, settings menu or X search for capture tool.
collections_table_placeholder: Data captured using the plugin or uploaded with the button below will appear here.
dataupload_error: File provided incompatible with chosen template, consider custom upload
snaTools_coorExportDescription: Export to json grouped per object and sharing pairs
snaTools_accountActivityDescription: Compare users activity in the dataset in terms of likes, number of entries or using other headers
snaTools_coorDescription: Check whether pairs of users shared the same content (object field) within a specified time window and to a greater degree than other pairs of users did (edge weight)
snaTools_coorTimeWindowHelperText: Amount of time in seconds during which shares are grouped together as coordinated
snaTools_coorEdgeThreshHelperText: Threshold for the number of times two users have to share the same content to be considered coordinated (e.g. 0.5 means kept users shared the same content more than the median of others in the dataset)
snaTools_coorMinParticipantsHelperText: Number of times users have to have posted in the dataset to be included in the analysis
snaTools_coorObjectChoiceHelperText: The content that would have been shared in coordination in the dataset (e.g. links, hashtags)
snaTools_hashtagAnalysisDescription: Visualize the hashtags most frequently used in the dataset and their co‑occurence
snaTools_mostMentionedDescription: Visualize the users most mentioned in the dataset (Captured X content only)
snaTools_textClustersDescription: Group text shared by users together into clusters based on semantic similarity
snaTools_timelineDistributionDescription: Distribution of posts in the dataset across time
snaTools_wordCloudDescription: Most frequently used terms in the dataset
snaTools_noResultMessage: Analysis did not return a result, field might be missing
uploadModal_crowdtangleFB_tooltip: For csv files exported from Facebook crowdtangle searches
uploadModal_snaTwitter_tooltip: For csv files exported from twitter date captured with this tool
uploadModal_snaTiktok_tooltip: For csv files exported from tiktok data captured with this tool
rawUploadIcon_hover_label: Add the raw JSON from a previously recorded collection to this collection
downloadIcon_hover_label: Download the reformated data in CSV or JSON or the raw network capture in JSON
